original_text: So he said to his sons, “Saddle the donkey for me.” And when they had saddled the donkey for him, he mounted it
korean_text: 그가 그의 아들들에게 이르되 나를 위하여 나귀에 안장을 지우라 그들이 나귀에 안장을 지우니 그가 타고

sentences.original_text: So he said to his sons
And when they had saddled the donkey for him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들이 그를 위해 나귀에 안장을 씌웠을 때
